https://tmrev.io/movie/104728-Ayyare 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The movie tries to caution common man from becoming a prey to the designs of conmen and fake godman, says Rajendra Prasad. “The bitter social message is delivered with humour acting as a sugar coating and my role portrays how by a quirk of fate, a person turns into a godman and then a pawn in the hands of villains,” he says. Ayyare
